scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter shared generate:openapi && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter shared type-check && pnpm --filter backend type-check && pnpm --filter frontend type-check
scripts.release:prep: pnpm run release:schema-diff && pnpm run release:version-bump
